name: Ophis by Transcen|Dance Project

address.streetAddress: 1087 Queen Street West Toronto, ON M6J 1H3

description:
After a sold-out run and two Dora Award nominations, we are returning with its mesmerizing, immersive retelling of the Medusa myth. 

In this daring new version, Medusa is reimagined not as a victim of a curse but as a symbol of empowerment and resilience. Ophis takes audiences on an emotional journey through love, vulnerability, and self-discovery while exploring themes of power, transformation, and sexuality. 

With a modern twist, the production challenges traditional narratives and invites viewers to confront the complexities of identity and power dynamics.
